userreviews.userReview: ***4 Hot Stars***Nothing says Happy Holidays like a red, sparkly dildo!

3 1/2 starsIf you've read The Tin Star, like I have, this quickie works as a very nice extra epilogue to that book. Being alreay familiar with Ethan and Jamie, you get to understand their dynamics, why their Christmas tree is so ugly and Ethan's early Christmas gift gets a new meaning. Plus, their dog Fred helping with the Christmas tree decorations makes it all sweeter as you remember how that "tradition" started.If you haven't read that book, this quickie is nothing more than a steamy m/m sex scene between two "married" men celebrating Christmas.
One very short, very lame sex scene... completes waste of $1.99

A very short story, only 16 pages, who present the two characters by The Tin Star, Ethan (Cowboy) and Jamie (Blue Eyes): I love those characters, The Tin Star is one of my first M/M romance, and I love the style of J.L. Langley, very funny. In this Christmas Tale, Jamie want a gift from Ethan, and he will no stop in front of anything to have it. This is the classical situation between the two: Jamie is young and impulsive, Ethan is strong and protective. Jamie is the light of love, Ethan is the home, or better, because we are at Christmas, Ethan is the Christmas Tree, and Jamie is the lights :-) An enjoyable reading to go in bed with a smile on your face.http://elisa-rolle.livejournal.com/19...

3.5 starsJamie and Ethan had such a rough beginning in ‘Tin Star’ that it’s nice to revisit them in this light Xmas short. Jamie has been hunting around the house for hidden presents and finally strikes a bargain with Ethan for opening an early present. It turns out to be a very special gift that should be opened in bed, hmmmmm. It isn’t Christmas without the gift of sweet lovin’ between two hot guys!
[having sex (hide spoiler)]
I loved it!Short, but hot and very sweet story :) If you loved The Tin Star, you'll love this one too!
This was a fun, 14 or so page story with one of my favorite couples. I loved it!
Let's just say the sex is soooooo effing hawwwt!!! I love it even though its short!!!
Very nice Tin start Christmas. I thought they were really going to do it under the tree.
hot hot hot hot HOT SMOKING HOT.

Ranches #3The Christmas Tree Bargain by J.L. LangleyThis story is short but sweet and features the residents of the Tin Star Ranch, who you can read about in the first book in this series.Read:December 2, 2015 - e-book

A cute little short (very short) story about Jamie and Ethan's Christmas after four years together. What could Ethan possibly buy for Jamie? Well, that's the surprise but suffice it to say, it makes Jamie very happy! Umm, and Ethan too, come to think of it.
2 1/2 stars
Loved reconnecting with these boys. Not quite sure about the sparkles, but it was hot. J L please tell us more of their life story.
A nice little short story, so glad we get to catch up with Jamie and Ethan again. Nice, hot sex scene :)

No shocks here. It's a quick sexy story about Ethan and Jamie at Christmas.
Awww ... what do you get the man who has everything?...can't tell you without spoiling the story! Suffice to say, this little short will have you panting cause it's a hot sexy little piece of smex.
This is a cute little novella revisting Ethan and Jamie and their good friends Sheriff Grayson and Shane. I was fun short and sexy.
A few hot short story about a naughty Christmas present. I loved the tin star and this was a great excuse to revisit those characters. I'd recommend this to any j l Langley fan

description: Christmas at The Tin Star Ranch brings means a lot of things to Jamie and Ethan. It's a time of togetherness to celebrate the adversity they've overcome to be together. It's also a time of playful bargaining.Ethan insists on his usual ugly Christmas tree, and Jamie wants something in exchange. An early Christmas gift is the agreed-upon price, and Ethan knows he needs to make it good. Luckily, Ethan knows just what toy will satisfy The Christmas Tree Bargain.Publisher’s Note: This is a male-male love story and contains homoerotic sex acts that may be offensive to some readers.
title:
The Christmas Tree Bargain
